<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Invoke Disaster](/Feats.aspx?ID=4762) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=583" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 135 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Wind Caller](/Feats.aspx?ID=4740)

</column>

---

You can invoke nature’s fury upon your foes. You gain the storm lord order spell (page 382).
name: Invoke Disaster
